<p><em>the Beijinger</em>'s staff would like to wish all our readers and friends, whether in Beijing or around the world, a <strong>Happy New Year</strong> and <strong>best wishes for 2012</strong>. We can't wait to see what the next year has in store for Beijing and hope you'll be with us every step of the way!</p><p><a href="http://www.thebeijinger.com/blog/2012/01/01/3-2-1-Happy-New-Year">read more</a></p>
